sentence.Network_en: The auditor has questioned the legality of the contracts.
sentence.Network_cn: 审计员质疑这些合同是否合法。

sentence.Network_en: The auditor examines the accounts of all county officers and departments.
sentence.Network_cn: 审计员查对所有县官员及各部门的帐目.

sentence.Network_en: The very term auditor and audit makes many of us feel uncomfortable.
sentence.Network_cn: 一说起审计师和审计,我们中的许多人都会感到不安.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French auditeur, from Latin auditor, from audire 'to hear'

entry.def: An auditor is an accountant who officially examines the accounts of organizations.

means.word_mean: 2. a student who attends a course but does not take it for credit
3. a qualified accountant who inspects the accounting records and practices of a business or other organization
